item.description:
In August, we're holding another SUNDAY Meetup. Since the cafe closes earlier on Sundays, we will start at 3:00.

The Lincoln Street Cafe is at the Newton Highlands stop on the Green D Line, or the Lincoln Street stop for the 59 bus.

This month's topic: Write something, anything!
Bring writing implements. Pen & Paper, keyboard, whatever you feel freest with.

Agenda:

3:00 Names.

Writing Exercise TBD.

4:00 Break

Open discussion. What would you like to talk about next?

5:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers August Meetup
